TYPOGRAPHY



HEADERS

H1 - LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET, CONSECTETUR ADIPISCING ELIT.

H2 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

H3 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

H4 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

H5 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
H6 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

P (PARAGRAPH TAG)

P - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent adipiscing massa a adipiscing tristique. Morbi rutrum mi quis metus tempus ullamcorper. Suspendisse et odio id mi placerat viverra. Nunc condimentum felis ante, eu consequat metus vestibulum id. Nulla facilisi. Nullam fermentum dui ut turpis tincidunt vulputate. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.


ETCHED

H4 with "etched" class. You can apply the "etched" class to any text element.


VALIDATION STATUS

You can apply the data-status attribute to any text element.

Validation Status: Normal

Validation Status: Validating

Validation Status: Valid

Validation Status: Invalid



HTML Example

  <!-- HEADERS -->
  <h1>H1 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</h1>
  <h2>H2 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</h2>
  <h3>H3 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</h3>
  <h4>H4 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</h4>
  <h5>H5 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</h5>
  <h6>H6 - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</h6>

  <!-- P -->
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Morbi vestibulum, nisi vel rhoncus molestie, libero metus hendrerit turpis, at faucibus mauris augue vel augue.</p>

  <!-- ETCHED TEXT -->
  <h4 class="etched">H4 with "etched" class. You can apply the "etched" class to any text element.</h4>

  <!-- VALIDATION STATUS -->
  <h4 data-status="status-normal">Validation Status: Normal</h4>
  <h4 data-status="status-validating">Validation Status: Validating</h4>
  <h4 data-status="status-valid">Validation Status: Valid</h4>
  <h4 data-status="status-invalid">Validation Status: Invalid</h4>








COMPONENTS



otk-radio









HTML Example

  <label class="vertical"><input name="group2" class="otk-radio" type="radio"/>10</label>
  <label><input class="otk-radio" type="radio"/>This is a radio button</label>
  <input class="otk-radio" type="radio" id="myradio" checked/><label for="myradio">Radio button type 2</label>
  <label disabled><input class="otk-radio" type="radio" checked disabled/>Disabled radio button</label>
  <input class="otk-radio" type="radio" checked disabled/><label disabled>Disabled radio button type 2</label>


otk-radio-rating







HTML Example

  <div id="radio-rating" class="otk-radio-rating" style="width: 240px;">
	<span class="lessLabel">Less Likely and hate it rawr</span>
	<span class="moreLabel">More Likely yay love it la la la</span>
	<div class="divider"/>
	<span class="radioContainer">
	  <label class="vertical"><input class="otk-radio" type="radio" name="undefined">1</label>
	  <label class="vertical"><input class="otk-radio" type="radio" name="undefined">2</label>
	  ...
	</span>
  </div>

  <div id="radio-rating1" class="otk-radio-rating" style="width: inherit;">
	<span class="lessLabel">Less Likely and hate it rawr</span>
	<span class="moreLabel">More Likely yay love it la la la</span>
	<div class="divider"/>
	<span class="radioContainer">
	  <label class="vertical"><input class="otk-radio" type="radio" name="undefined">1</label>
	  <label class="vertical"><input class="otk-radio" type="radio" name="undefined">2</label>
	  ...
	</span>
  </div>


JS Example

  $.otkRadioRatingCreate($('#radio-rating'),
	{
	  lessLabel: "Less Likely and hate it rawr",
	  moreLabel: "More Likely yay love it la la la",
	  count: 11,
	  name: "radio-rating"
	});

otk-progressbar





HTML Example

  <!-- PROGRESS BAR ACTIVE-->

  <div class="otk-progressbar active" style="width:300px">
	<div class="bar" data-progress-value=".45" style="width: 75%"></div>
	<h5 class="text">45%</h5>
  </div>

  <!-- PROGRESS BAR INDETERMINATE -->

  <div class="otk-progressbar indeterminate" style="width:300px">
	<div class="bar" data-progress-value="" style="width: 100%"></div>
	<h5 class="text"></h5>
  </div>

  <!-- PROGRESS BAR COMPLETE-->

  <div class="otk-progressbar complete" style="width:300px">
	<div class="bar" data-progress-value="1" style="width: 100%"></div>
	<h5 class="text">Download Complete</h5>
  </div>

  <!-- PROGRESS BAR PAUSED-->

  <div class="otk-progressbar paused" style="width:300px">
	<div class="bar" data-progress-value=".45" style="width: 45%"></div>
	<h5 class="text">45%</h5>
  </div>

  <!-- PROGRESS BAR ACTIVE GREEN-->

  <div class="otk-progressbar active" color=green style="width:300px">
	<div class="bar" data-progress-value=".45" style="width: 75%"></div>
	<h5 class="text">45%</h5>
  </div>

  <!-- PROGRESS BAR ACTIVE GREEN WITH DIVIDER FLAG-->

  <div class="otk-divider-flag" style="margin-left: 76px;">Playable</div>
  <div id="progressbar-green" style="width:300px;" class="otk-progressbar active" color="Color-Blue">
	<div class="bar" data-progress-value="0" style="width: 0%;"></div>
	<h5 class="text">0%</h5>
	<div class="otk-divider vertical" style="height: 24px; position: relative; top: -2px; left: 75px;"></div>
  </div>


JS Example

  $.otkProgressBarCreate($('#progressbar-active'),
	{
	  progress: .75,
	  state: 'State-Active'
	});

  $.otkProgressBarCreate($('#progressbar-indeterminate'),
	{
	  state: 'State-Indeterminate'
	});

  $.otkProgressBarCreate($('#progressbar-complete'),
	{
	  progress: 1,
	  state: 'State-Complete',
	  text: 'Update Complete'
	});

  $.otkProgressBarCreate($('#progressbar-paused'),
	{
	  progress: 0.6,
	  state: 'State-Paused'
	});

  var $greenprogress = $.otkProgressBarCreate($('#progressbar-green'),
	{
	  progress: 0,
	  state: 'State-Active',
	  color: 'Color-Blue',
	});
  $greenprogress.otkProgressBar("addProgressFlag", 0.25, "Playable", "Color-Green");
  $greenprogress.otkProgressBar('removeProgressFlag', 0.25);

  // Updating the progress bar
  $greenprogress.otkProgressBar(
	{
	  progress: 0,
	  state: 'State-Active',
	  color: 'Color-Blue',
	});
  $greenprogress.otkProgressBar("update");


otk-progressbar-detailed




a long title and most likely has a soundtrack with a long name also

Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare
100.00 B / 100.00 B
34:34:34 Remaining
10%
100.00 B/sec


HTML Example

  <!-- PROGRESS BAR ACTIVE-->

  <div id="premade-progress" style="width:350px" class="otk-progressbar-detailed">
    <h4 class="title" title="a long title and most likely has a soundtrack with a long name also">
      a long title and most likely has a soundtrack with a long name also
    </h4>
    <h5 class="sub-title" title="Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare">
      Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare
    </h5>
    <div class="otk-progressbar active">
      <div class="bar" data-progress-value="0" style="width: 0%;"></div>
      <h5 class="text"></h5>
    </div>
    <div class="otk-tooltip bottom" style="display: none; top: 5571.640625px; left: 129.5px;">100.00 B / 100.00 B</div>
    <div class="status-container">
      <h5 class="time-remaining"><b>34:34:34</b> Remaining</h5>
      <h5 class="percent">10%</h5>
      <h5 class="bytes-per-second">100.00 B/sec</h5>
    </div>
  </div>


JS Example

  // Strings used inside of progress details
  var downloadProgressStrings =
	{
	  timeRemaining: '%1 Remaining',
	  percentNotation: '%1%',
	  seconds: 'sec'
	}

  var byteFunc = function(bytes)
	{
	  var KB = 1024,
	      MB = 1048576,
	      GB = 1073741824,
	      TB = 1099511627776;
	  if (bytes < KB)
	  {
	  	  return ("%1 B").replace('%1', bytes.toFixed(2));
	  }
	  else if (bytes < MB)
	  {
	  	  return ("%1 KB").replace('%1', (bytes / KB).toFixed(2));
	  }
	  else if (bytes < GB)
	  {
	  	  return ("%1 MB").replace('%1', (bytes / MB).toFixed(2));
	  }
	  else if (bytes < TB)
	  {
	  	  return ("%1 GB").replace('%1', (bytes / GB).toFixed(2));
	  }
	  else
	  {
	  	  return ("%1 TB").replace('%1', (bytes / TB).toFixed(2));
	  }
	};


  // Creating one from scratch
  var $progressbarDetailed = $.otkProgressBarDetailedCreate($('#detailed-progress'),
	{
	  title: "a long title and most likely has a soundtrack with a long name also",
	  subtitle: "Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare Painter's Nightmare",
	  bytesDownloaded: 100,
	  totalFileSize: 100,
	  bytesPerSecond: 100,
	  progress: .65,
	  secondsRemaining: '34:34:34',
	  formatBytesFunction: byteFunc,
	  strings: downloadProgressStrings
	});
  // Set the options on the progress bar
  $progressbarDetailed.otkProgressBarDetailed("progressbar").otkProgressBar(
	{
	  progress: .65,
	  state: 'State-Active'
	});

  // Update component
  $progressbarDetailed.otkProgressBarDetailed(
	{
	  title: "a long title and most likely has a soundtrack with a long name also"
	});
  $progressbarDetailed.otkProgressBarDetailed('update');

  // Update one that already exists
  $('#premade-progress').otkProgressBarDetailed(
	{
	  title: "Edited title",
	  subtitle: 'Edited sub title',
	  formatBytesFunction: byteFunc,
	  strings: downloadProgressStrings
	});
  // Set the options on the progress bar
  $('#premade-progress').otkProgressBarDetailed("progressbar").otkProgressBar(
	{
	  progress: .30,
	  state: 'State-Indeterminate'
	});


otk-button





HTML Example

  <button class="otk-button primary">Primary</button>

  <button class="otk-button secondary">Secondary</button>

  <button class="otk-button tertiary">Tertiary</button>

  <button class="otk-button dark">Dark Button</button>

You can easily add images or other content inside a button as follows. You may have to add some additional styles to your content to get it to position correctly inside the button.

CONTENT BEFORE THE BUTTON LABEL


CONTENT AFTER THE BUTTON LABEL


HTML Example

  <!-- CONTENT BEFORE THE BUTTON LABEL -->

  <button class="otk-button primary"><img src='images/play-icon.png' style="left: -4px; top: -1px;"></img> Play Game</button>
  <button class="otk-button dark"><img src='images/add-friend.png' style="margin-left: 2px; margin-right: 2px;"></img> Add Friends</button>
  <button class="otk-button tertiary"><img src='images/pause.png' style="left: -4px; top: -1px;"></img> Pause</button>

  <!-- CONTENT AFTER THE BUTTON LABEL -->

  <button class="otk-button primary">Play Game <img src='images/play-icon.png' style="left: 4px; top: -1px;"></img></button>
  <button class="otk-button dark">Add Friends <img src='images/add-friend.png' style="margin-left: 2px; margin-right: 2px;"></img></button>
  <button class="otk-button tertiary">Pause <img src='images/pause.png' style="margin-left: 2px; margin-right: 2px; top: -1px;"></img></button>


TOOLBAR BUTTONS



TOGGLE STYLE



HTML Example

  <!-- SIMPLE TOOLBAR BUTTON -->
  <button class="otk-button toolbar"><img src="images/invite-friends.png"></img></button>

  <!-- DROPDOWN TOOLBAR BUTTON -->
  <span class="otk-button toolbar dropdown">
	<button><img src="images/voip-icon.png"></img></button>
	<button class="dropdown"></button>
  </span>

  <!-- "PRESSED" STYLE -->
  <button class="otk-button toolbar pressed"><img src="images/invite-friends.png"></img></button>

  <span class="otk-button toolbar dropdown">
	<button class="pressed"><img src="images/voip-icon.png"></img></button>
	<button class="dropdown"></button>
  </span>

  <!-- TOGGLE STYLE -->

  <!-- Note that the only thing the toolkit currently supplies is support for a "pressed" class on toolbar buttons. -->
  <!-- If you want to toggle the pressed state you'll need to add something like the following:						-->

  <button class="otk-button toolbar otk-toggle-pressed"><img src="images/invite-friends.png"></img></button>

  <span class="otk-button toolbar dropdown">
	<button class="otk-toggle-pressed"><img src="images/voip-icon.png"></img></button>
	<button class="dropdown"></button>
  </span>

  <!--	AND IN YOUR JAVASCRIPT... -->
  $('body').on('click', '.otk-toggle-pressed', function(e)
  {
	$(this).toggleClass('pressed');
  });

otk-mini-level-indicator




HTML Example

  <!-- VERTICAL -->
  <div class="otk-mini-level-indicator" data-orientation="vertical">
	<div class="segment"></div>
	<div class="segment"></div>
	<div class="segment"></div>
	<div class="segment lit"></div>
	<div class="segment lit"></div>
	<div class="segment lit"></div>
  </div>

  <!-- HORIZONTAL -->
  <div class="otk-mini-level-indicator" data-orientation="horizontal">
	<div class="segment"></div>
	<div class="segment"></div>
	<div class="segment"></div>
	<div class="segment lit"></div>
	<div class="segment lit"></div>
	<div class="segment lit"></div>
  </div>


JS Example

  <!-- VERTICAL -->
  var $indicator = $.otkMiniLevelIndicatorCreate('<div>',
	{
	  numSegments: 6,
	  orientation: "vertical",
	  value: .5
	});

  <!-- HORIZONTAL -->
  var $indicator = $.otkMiniLevelIndicatorCreate('<div>',
	{
	  numSegments: 6,
	  orientation: "horizontal",
	  value: .5
	});

  // Get the value
  var value = $indicator.otkMiniLevelIndicator("value");

  // Set the value (range of 0-1)
  $indicator.otkMiniLevelIndicator("value", .5);

  var $indicator = $.otkLevelIndicatorCreate('<div>',
	{
	  value: .5
	});


  // Get the value
  var value = $indicator.otkLevelIndicator("value");

  // Set the value (range of 0-1)
  $indicator.otkLevelIndicator("value", .5);

away

online
away
joinable
ingame
broadcasting
unavailable


HTML Example

  <div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="online"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="away"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="joinable"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="ingame"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="broadcasting"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="unavailable"></div>

  <div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="online"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="away"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="joinable"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="ingame"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="broadcasting"></div>
  <div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="unavailable"></div>


otk-custom-glyph





HTML TEST - Etched
HTML TEST - Drop Shadow


HTML Example

  <!-- Etched -->
  <span class="otk-custom-glyph">
	<span class="shadow layer" style="-webkit-mask-image:url('images/icon-mask.png'); background-color: white; top:1px; bottom:-1px;"></span>
	<span class="glyph layer" style="-webkit-mask-image:url('images/icon-mask.png'); background-color: #444444;"></span>
  </span>

  <!-- Drop Shadow -->
  <span class="otk-custom-glyph">
	<span class="shadow layer" style="-webkit-mask-image:url('images/icon-mask.png'); background-color: black; top:1px; bottom:-1px; opacity: .4;"></span>
	<span class="glyph layer" style="-webkit-mask-image:url('images/icon-mask.png'); background-color: white;"></span>
  </span>


JS Example

  // Create a glyph with a drop shadow
  var $glyph = $.otkCustomGlyphCreate('<span>',
  {
	maskImageURL: "images/icon-mask.png",
	glyphColor: "#ffffff",
	shadowColor: "#000000",
	shadowOffsetX: 0,
	shadowOffsetY: 1,
	shadowOpacity: .5,
	autoSize: true
  });

  // Create a glyph with an inset or "etched" effect
  var $glyph = $.otkCustomGlyphCreate('<span>',
  {
	maskImageURL: "images/icon-mask.png",
	glyphColor: "#444444",
	shadowColor: "#ffffff",
	shadowOffsetX: 0,
	shadowOffsetY: 1,
	shadowOpacity: 1,
	autoSize: true
  });

  // Create a glyph with no drop shadow
  var $glyph = $.otkCustomGlyphCreate('<span>',
  {
	maskImageURL: "images/icon-mask.png",
	glyphColor: "#444444",
	shadowOpacity: 0,
	autoSize: true
  });

  // Create a "blue" colored glyph with an etched effect
  var $glyph = $.otkCustomGlyphCreate('<span>',
  {
	maskImageURL: "images/icon-mask.png",
	glyphColor: "Blue",
	shadowColor: "#ffffff",
	shadowOffsetX: 0,
	shadowOffsetY: 1,
	shadowOpacity: 1,
	autoSize: true
  });

  // GETTERS
  var url = $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("maskImageURL");
  var color = $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("glyphColor");
  var shadowColor = $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("shadowColor");
  var offsetX = $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("shadowOffsetX");
  var offsetY = $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("shadowOffsetY");
  var opacity = $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("shadowOpacity");
  var autoSize = $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("autoSize");

  // SETTERS
  $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("setMaskImageURL", {url to image});
  $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("setGlyphColor", {color value});
  $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("setShadowColor", {color value});
  $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("setShadowOffsetX", {x offset});
  $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("setShadowOffsetY", {y offset});
  $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("setShadowOpacity", {opacity});
  $glyph.otkCustomGlyph("setAutoSize", {true or false});

otk-contact



(click to toggle selection state)



    HTML Example
    
  <{some element} class="otk-contact">
	<div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="{presence state - see otk-presence-indicator}"></div>
	<img class="otk-user-avatar" src={path to avatar image}>
	<div class="name">
	  <span class="nickname">{nickname}</span>
	  <span class="realname">{real name}</span>
	</div>
	<span class="presence">{presence}</span>
	<button class="otk-hover-context-menu-button"></button>
  </{some element}>

  // With action hyperlinks

  <{some element} class="otk-contact">
	<div class="otk-presence-indicator" data-presence="{presence state - see otk-presence-indicator}"></div>
	<img class="otk-user-avatar" src={path to avatar image}>
	<div class="name">
	  <span class="nickname">{nickname}</span>
	  <span class="realname">{real name}</span>
	</div>
	<span class="presence">
	  <a class="otk-hyperlink" href="#accept">Accept</a>
	  <a class="otk-hyperlink" href="#reject">Reject</a>
	</span>
	<button class="otk-hover-context-menu-button"></button>
  </{some element}>


    JS Example
    
  var $contact = $.otkContactCreate('<li>',
  {
	nicknameLabel: "CarlSpoon",
	realnameLabel: "Bob Loblaw",
	presenceLabel: "Online",
	presenceIndicator: "online",
	avatarPath: "http://.../photo.jpg"
  });

  // You can add action links links to the contact like this:
  $contact.otkContact("actionLink", "Accept", "#accept");
  $contact.otkContact("actionLink", "Reject", "#reject");

  // You can remove the action link(s) like this:
  $contact.eaContact("removeActionLinks");

  // GETTERS
  var nickname = $contact.otkContact("nicknameLabel");
  var realname = $contact.otkContact("realnameLabel");
  var presenceLabel = $contact.otkContact("presenceLabel");
  var presenceValue = $contact.otkContact("presenceIndicator");
  var avatarPath = $contact.otkContact("avatarPath");

  // SETTERS
  $contact.otkContact("nicknameLabel", {nickname});
  $contact.otkContact("realnameLabel", {real name});
  $contact.otkContact("presenceLabel", {presence label});
  $contact.otkContact("presenceIndicator", {presence state - see otk-presence-indicator});
  $contact.otkContact("avatarPath", {path to avatar image});


    TEST OF PASTING A CONTACT STRUCTURE DIRECTLY INTO HTML

    • Nickname Real Name
      Presence

    otk-contact-group



    (click to toggle selection state)



    HTML Example
    
  <section class="otk-contact-group expanded" data-toggle-target="#foo"> <!-- will hide/show element "#foo" when clicked -->
	<div class="otk-expand-collapse-indicator expanded"></div>
	<span class="label">{Group Name}</span>
	<span class="otk-count-bubble">{Group Count}</span>
  </section>


    JS Example
    
  var $group = $.otkContactGroupCreate('<section>',
  {
	label: "Offline",
	count: 0
  });

  // Specify the toggle target
  $group.attr('data-toggle-target', '#foo'); <!-- will hide/show element "#foo" when clicked -->

  // Toggle the group expanded or collapsed
  $group.otkContactGroup("toggle");

  // SETTERS
  $group.otkContactGroup("setLabel", {text for label});
  $group.otkContactGroup("setCount", {integer count value});
  $group.otkContactGroup("setExpanded", {true or false});

  // GETTERS
  var label = $group.otkContactGroup("label");
  var count = $group.otkContactGroup("count");
  var expanded = $group.otkContactGroup("expanded");

    AN EMPTY TOOLBAR

  var $callout = $.otkEmptyListCalloutCreate('<section>',
  {
	titleLabel: "Gaming is better with Friends",
	descriptionLabel: "Build your Friends List so you can see what your friends are playing and chat with them from your game.",
	buttonLabel: "Find Friends",
	style: "info-style"
  });

  // When the callout button is clicked, the otk-empty-list-callout component
  // fires a "buttonClicked" trigger event. You can consume
  // the event like this:
  $('body').on('buttonClicked', '.otk-empty-list-callout', function(e)
  {
	console.log("Callout Button Clicked");
  });

    otk-count-badge


    1


    autoHide option enabled / "auto-hide" class added
    1




    TEST OF PASTING A COUNT BADGE DIRECTLY INTO HTML
    4


    HTML Example
    
  <div class="otk-count-badge auto-hide">4</div>


    JS Example
    
  // Create a badge with options
  var $badge = $({some element}).otkCountBadge({ value: 1, autoHide: false });

  // Increment the badge
  $badge.otkCountBadge("increment");

  // Clear the badge
  $badge.otkCountBadge("clear");

  // Set the badge value
  $badge.otkCountBadge("setValue", 1);

  // Get the badge value
  var value = $badge.otkCountBadge("value");


    otk-tabs

    • Tab One

    TEST OF PASTING A SIMPLE TABS STRUCTURE DIRECTLY INTO HTML

    • Tab One
    • Tab Two
    • Tab Three
    • Tab Four


    TEST OF PASTING A COMPLEX TABS STRUCTURE DIRECTLY INTO HTML

    • Tab One
      20
    • Tab Two
      6
    • Tab Three
      8
    • Tab Four Subtitle Goes Here
      12


    HTML Example
    

  <!-- Simple tabs example -->
  <div class="otk-tabs">
	<ul>
	  <li class="current"> <!-- select this tab -->
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab One</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
	  </li>
	  <li>
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab Two</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
	  </li>
	  <li>
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab Three</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
	  </li>
	  <li>
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab Four</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
	  </li>
	</ul>
  </div>

  <!-- Complex tabs with icons, close buttons and notification badges -->
  <div class="otk-tabs closeable draggable etched">
	<ul>
	  <li class="current"> <!-- select this tab -->
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="icon1"><img src='images/voip-tab-icon.png'></img></div>
		  <div class="icon2"><div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="online"></div></div>
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab One</span>
			<span class="subtitle">Subtitle Goes Here</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
		<button class="otk-close-button small"></button>
		<div class="otk-count-badge auto-hide">20</div>
	  </li>
	  <li>
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="icon1"></div>
		  <div class="icon2"><div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="away"></div></div>
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab Two</span>
			<span class="subtitle">Subtitle Goes Here</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
		<button class="otk-close-button small"></button>
		<div class="otk-count-badge auto-hide">6</div>
	  </li>
	  <li>
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="icon1"></div>
		  <div class="icon2"><div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="ingame"></div></div>
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab Three</span>
			<span class="subtitle">Subtitle Goes Here</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
		<button class="otk-close-button small"></button>
		<div class="otk-count-badge auto-hide">8</div>
	  </li>
	  <li>
		<div class="contents">
		  <div class="icon1"></div>
		  <div class="icon2"></div>
		  <div class="labels">
			<span class="title">Tab Four</span>
			<span class="subtitle">Subtitle Goes Here</span>
		  </div>
		</div>
		<button class="otk-close-button small"></button>
		<div class="otk-count-badge auto-hide">12</div>
	  </li>
	</ul>
  </div>


    JS Example
    
  var $tabs = $.otkTabsCreate('<div>',
  {
	squareFirstTab: false,
	closeable: true,
	draggable: false,
	short: false
  });
  $tabs.otkTabs("appendTab", "Tab One", "");
  $tabs.otkTabs("appendTab", "Tab Two", "");
  $tabs.otkTabs("appendTab", "Tab Three", "");
  $tabs.otkTabs("appendTab", "Tab Four", "Subtitle Goes Here");

  // Get the number of tabs
  numTabs = $tabs.otkTabs("tabCount");

  // Append a new tab
  $tabs.otkTabs("appendTab", "Tab Five", "Subtitle Goes Here");

  // Close a tab
  $tabs.otkTabs("closeTab", $tab);

  // Select a tab by index
  $tabs.otkTabs("selectTabByIndex", 1);

  // Get the index of the specified tab
  index = $tabs.otkTabs("tabIndex", $tab);

  // Select a tab by element
  $tabs.otkTabs("selectTab", $tab);

  // Get the selected tab element
  $selectedTab = $tabs.otkTabs("selectedTab");

  // Get the selected tab index
  selectedTabIndex = $tabs.otkTabs("selectedTabIndex");

  // Get the tab at the specified index
  $tab = $tabs.otkTabs("tabByIndex", 1);

  // Notify a tab
  $tabs.otkTabs("notifyTab", $tab);

  // Get a tab's title text
  var text = $tabs.otkTabs("tabTitle", $tab);

  // Set a tab's title text
  $tabs.otkTabs("setTabTitle", $tab, "Tab Title Text");

  // Get a tab's subtitle text
  var text = $tabs.otkTabs("tabSubtitle", $tab);

  // Set a tab's subtitle text
  $tabs.otkTabs("setTabSubtitle", $tab, "Tab Subtitle Text");

  // Set tab icon 1
  $tabs.otkTabs("setTabIcon1", $tab, $('<img src="images/voip-tab-icon.png"></img>'));

  // Set tab icon 2
  $tabs.otkTabs("setTabIcon2", $tab, $('<div class="otk-presence-indicator inset" data-presence="online"></div>'));

  // Clear tab icon 1
  $tabs.otkTabs("clearTabIcon1", $tab);

  // Clear tab icon 2
  $tabs.otkTabs("clearTabIcon2", $tab);

  // Returns a collection containing all <li> tab elements in the tab component
  var $allTabs = $tabs.otkTabs("allTabs");

  // Returns an array of all tabs that are at least partically scrolled out of view
  var overflowedTabs = $tabs.otkTabs("overflowedTabs");

  // ** CATCHING TAB EVENTS **

  // Closing a tab when the tab's optional close button has been clicked
  // Note that this does not happen automatically! By default clicking the close
  // button on a tab merely triggers a "tabCloseClicked" event. You can put
  // any "Are you sure" confirmation logic etc in this function if you desire.
  $('body').on('tabCloseClicked', '.otk-tabs', function(e, $tab)
  {
	$(this).otkTabs("closeTab", $tab);
  });

  // Tab selection changed
  $('body').on('currentTabChanged', '.otk-tabs', function(e, $tab)
  {
	console.log("Current tab changed");
  });

  // A tab was closed
  $('body').on('tabClosed', '.otk-tabs', function(e, $tab)
  {
	console.log("Tab closed");
  });

  // Number of tabs changed
  $('body').on('numTabsChanged', '.otk-tabs', function(e)
  {
	console.log("Number of tabs changed");
  });

  // A tab has been notified
  $('body').on('tabNotified', '.otk-tabs', function(e, $tab)
  {
	console.log("Tab notified");
  });

  // Tab drag start
  $('body').on('tabDragStart', function(e, $tab)
  {
	console.log("A tab has started drag");
  });

  // Tab dropped
  $('body').on('tabDropped', function(e, $tab)
  {
	console.log("A tab was dropped");
  });

  // Tab being dragged
  // Be very careful about how you consume this event.
  // It is called every time a tab is dragged by even a single pixel
  // and is called repeatedly as the tab continues to be dragged.
  $('body').on('tabDragged', function(e, $tab)
  {
	console.log("A tab is being dragged");
  });

      HTML Example
      

  <!-- EMPTY CAROUSEL -->
  <section class='otk-tabs-carousel'>
	<div class='carousel'>
	  <div class='endcap left'>
		<button class="scroll-left"></button>
	  </div>
	  <div class='tabs-content'>
		<!-- AN otk-tabs COMPONENT GOES HERE-->
	  </div>
	  <div class='endcap right'>
		<button class="scroll-right"></button>
		<button class="overflow"></button>
	  </div>
	</div>
	<div class="overflow-menu">
		<div class="scroll-up scroll-button"></div>
		<div class="scroll-area">
			<ul class="items"></ul>
		</div>
		<div class="scroll-down scroll-button"></div>
	</div>
  </section>

  <!-- CAROUSEL WITH SOME TABS -->
  <section class='otk-tabs-carousel'>
	<div class='carousel'>
	  <div class='endcap left'>
		<button class="scroll-left"></button>
	  </div>
	  <div class='tabs-content'>

		<!-- START otk-tabs COMPONENT -->
		<div class="otk-tabs">
		  <ul>
			<!-- tab one -->
			<li>
			  <div class="contents">
			  <div class="labels">
				<span class="title">Tab One</span>
			  </div>
			  </div>
			</li>
			<!-- more tabs... -->
		  </ul>
		</div>
		<!-- END otk-tabs COMPONENT -->

	  </div>
	  <div class='endcap right'>
		<button class="scroll-right"></button>
		<button class="overflow"></button>
	  </div>
	</div>
	<div class="overflow-menu">
		<div class="scroll-up scroll-button"></div>
		<div class="scroll-area">
			<ul class="items"></ul>
		</div>
		<div class="scroll-down scroll-button"></div>
	</div>
  </section>
      JS Example
      

  // Create an otk-tabs-carousel
  var $carousel = $.otkTabsCarouselCreate('<section>', {});

  // See otk-tabs JS documentation for how to create an otk-tab component
  var $tabs = $.otkTabsCreate(...);

  // Add an otk-tabs component to the carousel
  $carousel.otkTabsCarousel("setTabs", $tabs);

  // You can also get the otk-tabs component hosted in the carousel like this:
  $tabs = $carousel.otkTabsCarousel("tabs");

  // Determine if the carousel is overflowed or not (returns true or false)
  var overflowed = $carousel.otkTabsCarousel("isOverflowed");

  // Scrolls the specified tab into view if it is not already
  // The value of 'animated" should be true or false
  $carousel.otkTabsCarousel("ensureTabVisible", $tab, animated);




      otk-slider


      TEST OF PASTING A SLIDER STRUCTURE DIRECTLY INTO HTML



      POINTER DIRECTIONS



      HTML Example
      
  <!-- No pointer -->
  <div class="otk-slider">
	  <div class="track outer">
		  <div class="track inner">
			  <div class="thumb"></div>
			  <div class="track unfilled"></div>
		  </div>
	  </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Pointer up -->
  <div class="otk-slider pointer-direction-up">
	  <div class="track outer">
		  <div class="track inner">
			  <div class="thumb"></div>
			  <div class="track unfilled"></div>
		  </div>
	  </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Pointer down -->
  <div class="otk-slider pointer-direction-down">
	  <div class="track outer">
		  <div class="track inner">
			  <div class="thumb"></div>
			  <div class="track unfilled"></div>
		  </div>
	  </div>
  </div>
      JS Example
      

  var $slider = $.otkSliderCreate('<div>',
  {
	  value: .5,
	  pointerDirection: "none" // Direction can be "none", "up" or "down"
  });

  // Set the slider's value
  $slider.otkSlider("setValue", .75);

  // Get the slider's value
  var value = $slider.otkSlider("value");

  // SLIDER EVENTS

  // Slider has been changed
  $('body').on('valueChanged', '.otk-slider', function(e, value)
  {
	  console.log("Slider value = " + parseInt(value*100) + "%");
  });

  // Slider is being changed
  $('body').on('valueChanging', '.otk-slider', function(e, value)
  {
	  console.log("Slider value = " + parseInt(value*100) + "%");
  });

    {
      text: "Some text here",
      bindedElement: $('#tooltip-parent1'),
      xOffset: -10,
      yOffset: 0
    });

  $('#tooltip').otkTooltip(
    {
      text: "Some text here",
      bindedElement: $('#tooltip-parent1'),
      xOffset: -10,
      yOffset: 0
    });




      otk-callout











      HTML Example
      
  <div class="otk-callout">
	<header>
	  <span class="content-line">
		<img class="icon">
		<div class="titles-container">
		  <h5 class="new-title">NEW</h5>
		  <h5 class="title">VOICE CHAT AND GROUPS</h5>
		</div>
		<button class="otk-close-button small"></button>
	  </span>
	</header>
	<section class="content">
	  <div class="content-line">
		<div class="content-img"><img src="images/icon-friend.png"></div>
		<p class="content-text">Call your Origin friends directly on their computers</p>
	  </div>
	</section>
  </div>
      JS Example
      
  var $callout = $.otkCalloutCreate(
	{
	  newTitle: "NEW WITH A REALLY LONG TITLE AND NEW LOOK",
	  title: "VOICE CHAT AND GROUPS AND A REALLY LONG TITLE WITH NEW LOOK",
	  content: [
		{text:'Call your Origin friends directly on their computers', imageUrl:'images/icon-friend.png'}
	  ],
	  bindedElement: $('#callout-parent5')
	});

  $('#premade-callout').otkCallout(
	{
	  newTitle: "Modified Premade",
	  title: "Modified premade description",
	  content: [
		{text:'this was modified'},
		{text:'line 2 modified'}
	  ],
	  bindedElement: $('#callout-parent6')
	});

  // Someone closed an otk-callout
  $('body').on('select', '.otk-callout', function(e)
  {
	// Save setting
  });

  // You can also offset the x/y position of where the callout will point to like so:
  var $callout = $.otkCalloutCreate(
	{
	  newTitle: "OFFSET",
	  title: "THIS IS A CALLOUT WITH AN OFFSET",
	  xOffset: 10,
	  yOffset: -10,
	  content: [
		{text:'Call your Origin friends directly on their computers', imageUrl:'images/icon-friend.png'}
	  ],
	  bindedElement: $('#callout-parent5')
	});
